yoruba: “Mo mọ̀wọ̀n ara-à mi” kì í ṣẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ èébú.
gold: “I am jealous of my dignity” does not hurl insults at others.
gen: The Yoruba proverb "“Mo mọ̀wọ̀n ara-à mi” kì í ṣẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ èébú" translates to "Knowing one's limits does not lead to disgrace" in English. This proverb emphasizes the importance of self-awareness and understanding one's capabilities to avoid embarrassment or failure.
